mapper.select:
SELECT #{nzrdwmc} as PCDWMC, to_char(max(jb.zhxgsj),'yyyy"年') AS PCSJ, to_char(min(jb.zhxgsj),'yyyy"年"MM"月"dd"日"') AS PCKSSJ, to_char(max(jb.zhxgsj),'yyyy"年"MM"月"dd"日"') AS PCJSSJ, to_char(min(jb.zhxgsj),'yyyy"年"') || to_char(min(jb.zhxgsj),'q') || '季度' PCJD, to_char(min(jb.zhxgsj),'yyyy"年"') || to_char(min(jb.zhxgsj),'q') || '季度' PCJD1, COUNT(jb.pcslbm) AJCOUNT FROM yx_pc_jbxx jb INNER JOIN xt_zzjg_dwbm dw ON jb.pcdwbm = dw.dwbm WHERE jb.sfsc = 'N' AND INSTR(#{dwbm},jb.pcdwbm) >=1 AND jb.pcjdbh = '011'
AND jb.zhxgsj >= "TO_DATE"(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND jb.zhxgsj <= "TO_DATE"(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT wmsys.wm_concat( lb.pcflmc || COUNT(jb.pcslbm) || '件') PCFLAJ FROM yx_pc_jbxx jb INNER JOIN xt_pc_lb lb ON jb.pcflbm = lb.pcflbm WHERE jb.sfsc = 'N' AND jb.pcjdbh = '011' AND INSTR(#{dwbm},jb.pcdwbm) >=1
AND jb.zhxgsj >= "TO_DATE"(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND jb.zhxgsj <= "TO_DATE"(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY lb.pcflbm,lb.pcflmc

SELECT wmsys.wm_concat(nvl2(jb.pcjl,jb.pcjl,'无结论') || COUNT(jb.pcslbm) || '件') PCJLAJ FROM yx_pc_jbxx jb INNER JOIN xt_pc_lb lb ON jb.pcflbm = lb.pcflbm WHERE jb.sfsc = 'N' AND jb.pcjdbh = '011' AND INSTR(#{dwbm},jb.pcdwbm) >=1
AND jb.zhxgsj >= "TO_DATE"(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND jb.zhxgsj <= "TO_DATE"(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY jb.pcjl

SELECT COUNT(jbxx.pcslbm) ajcount, COUNT(DISTINCT jbxx.bpc_dwbm || jbxx.bpc_gh) rycount from yx_pc_jbxx jbxx WHERE jbxx.sfsc = 'N' AND jbxx.pcflbm = #{pcflbm} AND INSTR(#{dwbm},jbxx.pcdwbm) >=1 AND jbxx.pcjdbh = '011'
AND jbxx.zhxgsj >= "TO_DATE"(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND jbxx.zhxgsj <= "TO_DATE"(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT wmsys.wm_concat(jb.bpc_bmmc || COUNT(jb.pcslbm) || '件') BMAJ FROM yx_pc_jbxx jb INNER JOIN xt_pc_lb lb ON jb.pcflbm = lb.pcflbm WHERE jb.sfsc = 'N' AND jb.pcflbm = #{pcflbm} AND jb.pcjdbh = '011' AND INSTR(#{dwbm},jb.pcdwbm) >=1
AND jb.zhxgsj >= "TO_DATE"(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND jb.zhxgsj <= "TO_DATE"(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY jb.bpc_bmbm,jb.bpc_bmmc

SELECT wmsys.wm_concat(jb.pcjl || COUNT(jb.pcslbm) || '件') JLAJ FROM yx_pc_jbxx jb INNER JOIN xt_pc_lb lb ON jb.pcflbm = lb.pcflbm WHERE jb.sfsc = 'N' AND jb.pcflbm = #{pcflbm} AND jb.pcjdbh = '011' AND INSTR(#{dwbm},jb.pcdwbm) >=1
AND jb.zhxgsj >= "TO_DATE"(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND jb.zhxgsj <= "TO_DATE"(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY jb.pcjl

SELECT to_char(min(jb.zhxgsj),'yyyy"年"') zxNd, COUNT(DISTINCT hd.pchdbm) hdcount, COUNT(jb.pcslbm) ajcount
FROM yx_pc_hd hd INNER JOIN yx_pc_jbxx jb ON hd.pchdbm = jb.pchdbm AND hd.pcflbm = jb.pcflbm WHERE jb.sfsc = 'N' AND hd.sfsc = 'N' AND jb.pcflbm = #{pcflbm} AND INSTR(#{dwbm},jb.pcdwbm) >=1 AND jb.pcjdbh = '011'
AND jb.zhxgsj >= "TO_DATE"(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND jb.zhxgsj <= "TO_DATE"(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT rownum xh, jb.pcslbm pcslbm, jb.bpc_dwmc badw, jb.ajmc ajmc, jb.bpc_mc cbr, jb.pcr_mc pcy, jb.pcr_dwmc pcdw, jb.pcjl pcjl
FROM yx_pc_jbxx jb WHERE jb.sfsc = 'N' AND jb.pcjl IS NOT NULL AND jb.pcjl IN ('瑕疵案件','优质案件','不合格案件') AND jb.pcjdbh = '011' AND INSTR(#{dwbm},jb.pcdwbm) >=1
AND jb.zhxgsj >= "TO_DATE"(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND jb.zhxgsj <= "TO_DATE"(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')

select MAX(jb.pcslbm) pcslbm, -- MAX(jb.bpc_dwmc) badw, -- MAX(jb.ajmc) ajmc, -- MAX(jb.bpc_mc) cbr, -- MAX(jb.pcr_mc) pcy, -- MAX(jb.pcr_dwmc) pcdw, -- MAX(jb.pcjl) pcjl, pcxfl2.pcxflbm, pcxfl2.pcxflmc, wmsys.wm_concat(pcx.pcxmc) pcxmc FROM yx_pc_jbxx jb LEFT JOIN yx_pc_pcx pcx ON jb.pcslbm = pcx.pcslbm AND ((pcx.pcfs = '1' AND pcx.pcjg = '1') OR(pcx.pcfs = '2' AND pcx.pcjg IS NOT NULL)) LEFT JOIN yx_pc_pcxfl pcxfl ON pcx.pcslbm = pcxfl.pcslbm AND pcx.pcxflbm = pcxfl.pcxflbm AND pcxfl.pcjg = '1' LEFT JOIN yx_pc_pcxfl pcxfl2 ON pcxfl.pcslbm = pcxfl2.pcslbm AND pcxfl.pcxflfbm = pcxfl2.pcxflbm AND pcxfl2.pcjg IS NULL WHERE jb.sfsc = 'N' AND jb.pcjl IS NOT NULL AND jb.pcjl IN ('瑕疵案件','优质案件','不合格案件') AND jb.pcjdbh = '011' AND jb.pcdwbm = #{dwbm}
AND jb.zhxgsj >= "TO_DATE"(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND jb.zhxgsj <= "TO_DATE"(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY jb.pcslbm, pcxfl2.pcxflbm, pcxfl2.pcxflmc ORDER BY jb.pcslbm

WITH table_pcsp AS( SELECT sp.pcspbm,sp.spwjbm,sp.spjl,sp.sprxm,sp.spjsmc FROM yx_pc_sp sp INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(sp.pcspbm) AS pcspbm FROM yx_pc_jzwj jzwj INNER JOIN yx_pc_sp sp ON jzwj.jzwjbh = sp.spwjbm WHERE jzwj.sfsc = 'N' AND jzwj.wjlx = '4' AND sp.spwjlx = '2' AND sp.sfsc = 'N' GROUP BY sp.spwjbm)s ON sp.pcspbm = s.pcspbm ) SELECT distinct jzwj.*, NVL2(t.pcspbm,DECODE(t.spjl,'不同意',t.spjsmc||'已退回','同意',t.spjsmc ||'已审批'，null,'待'||t.spjsmc || '审批'),nvl2(cz.czsj,cz.czrmc || '已退回','未送审')) sszt
FROM yx_pc_jzwj jzwj inner join xt_pc_wsmb wsmb ON jzwj.jzmlh = wsmb.jzmlh AND jzwj.wsmbbh = wsmb.wsmbbh left join xt_pc_lb lb on wsmb.pcflbm = lb.pcflbm AND jzwj.wjlx = wsmb.wsmblb LEFT JOIN table_pcsp t ON jzwj.jzwjbh = t.spwjbm left join yx_rz_cz cz on jzwj.jzwjbh = cz.pcslbm and cz.czlx = '3' WHERE jzwj.sfsc = 'N' AND jzwj.wsmbbh = #{wsmbbh}
AND jzwj.nzrdwbm in
#{dw}
AND jzwj.cjsj >= "TO_DATE"(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND jzwj.cjsj <= "TO_DATE"(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND((t.SPWJBM IS NULL) OR (t.SPWJBM IS NOT NULL AND t.SPJL is NULL) )
AND t.SPWJBM IS NOT NULL AND t.SPJL is not NULL
AND ((jzwj.nzrdwbm = #{nzr_dwbm} and jzwj.nzrgh = #{nzr_gh} and jzwj.bszt ='9') or (jzwj.bszt = '1'))
AND jzwj.nzrdwbm = #{nzr_dwbm} and jzwj.nzrgh = #{nzr_gh} and jzwj.bszt !='9'
order by jzwj.cjsj desc

WITH table_pcsp AS( SELECT sp.pcspbm,sp.spwjbm,sp.spjl,sp.sprxm,sp.spjsmc,sp.sfsc,sp.SPWJLX FROM yx_pc_sp sp INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(sp.pcspbm) AS pcspbm FROM yx_pc_jzwj jzwj INNER JOIN yx_pc_sp sp ON jzwj.jzwjbh = sp.spwjbm WHERE jzwj.sfsc = 'N' AND jzwj.wjlx = '4' AND sp.spwjlx = '2' AND sp.sfsc = 'N' GROUP BY sp.spwjbm)s ON sp.pcspbm = s.pcspbm )
SELECT distinct hd.pchdbm, hd.pchdmc, lb.pcflbm, lb.pcflmc, hd.cjrmc, jzwj.jzwjbh, jzwj.wscflj, jzwj.nzrdwbm, jzwj.nzrdwmc, jzwj.nzrgh, jzwj.nzrxm, jzwj.wjmc, jzwj.cjsj, jzwj.bszt, NVL2(t.pcspbm,DECODE(t.spjl,'不同意',t.spjsmc||'已退回','同意',t.spjsmc ||'已审批',null,'待'||t.spjsmc || '审批'),nvl2(cz.czsj,cz.czrmc || '已退回','未送审')) sszt
FROM yx_pc_hd hd LEFT JOIN xt_pc_lb lb ON hd.pcflbm = lb.pcflbm LEFT JOIN yx_pc_jzwj jzwj ON hd.pchdbm = jzwj.pczybm AND jzwj.wjlx = '4' AND jzwj.wsmbbh = #{wsmbbh} AND jzwj.SFSC = 'N'
AND jzwj.cjsj >= "TO_DATE"(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND jzwj.cjsj <= "TO_DATE"(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
LEFT JOIN table_pcsp t ON jzwj.JZWJBH = t.SPWJBM AND t.SPWJLX = '2' AND t.sfsc = 'N' left join yx_rz_cz cz on jzwj.jzwjbh = cz.pcslbm and cz.czlx = '3' WHERE hd.sfsc = 'N' AND hd.pcflbm = #{pcflbm}
AND hd.pcdwbm in
#{dw}
AND((t.SPWJBM IS NULL) OR (t.SPWJBM IS NOT NULL AND t.SPJL is NULL) )
AND t.SPWJBM IS NOT NULL AND t.SPJL is not NULL
AND ((jzwj.nzrdwbm = #{nzr_dwbm} and jzwj.nzrgh = #{nzr_gh} and jzwj.bszt ='9') or (jzwj.bszt = '1'))
AND jzwj.nzrdwbm = #{nzr_dwbm} and jzwj.nzrgh = #{nzr_gh} and jzwj.bszt in ('0','1')

SELECT PCSPBM, SPWJLX, SPWJBM, SSRDWBM, SSRDWMC, SSRGH, SSRXM, SSRQ, SPRDWBM, SPRDWMC, SPRGH, SPRXM, SPRQ, SPJL, SPYJ, SFSC, CJSJ, ZHXGSJ, SPJSBM, SPJSMC FROM YX_PC_SP WHERE SPWJBM = #{spwjbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sfsc = 'N' order by cjsj asc

SELECT ry.dwbm, dwbm.dwmc, ry.gh, ry.mc, jsbm.jsbm, jsbm.jsmc, jsbm.spjsbm FROM xt_qx_ryjsfp fp INNER JOIN xt_zzjg_rybm ry ON fp.dwbm = ry.dwbm AND fp.gh = ry.gh inner join xt_zzjg_dwbm dwbm on ry.dwbm = dwbm.dwbm INNER JOIN xt_qx_jsbm jsbm ON fp.jsbm = jsbm.jsbm AND fp.bmbm = jsbm.bmbm AND jsbm.jsbm IN ('104','107','120') WHERE fp.dwbm = #{dwbm} AND jsbm.spjsbm != '30'
and jsbm.spjsbm = '50'
AND jsbm.spjsbm = #{spjsbm} + 10
AND fp.dwbm || fp.gh != #{dwbm} || #{gh}
mapper.update: call pkg_pclc.proc_add_spjl(#{p_spwjlx,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_spwjbm, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_ssrdwbm, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_ssrdwmc, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_ssrgh, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_ssrxm, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_sprdwbm, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_sprdwmc, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_sprgh, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_sprxm, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_spjsbm, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_spjsmc, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_pcspbm,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
